website_summaries.verdict: A responsive little dog robot that is fun for youngsters and also entertaining for older kids and teens.
pros: One of three "puppies" of the original CHiP toy
Does tricks, delivers various reactions, and operates with the included remote control
Will interact with other dog robots by the brand
cons: Remote can be quirky and has been known to malfunction
Wheels can fall off with typical play
Requires a bit of tech knowledge to operate

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! It's simple enough for little kids to use and play with compared to the bigger version (WowWee Chip) that requires more teh training and apps. This is perfect for little ones who wants their own little robot dog. The size is perfect for little hands too. It has some good weight on it and it not cheaply made. It rolls on carpeted floors!! It doesn't come with batteries, it requires AAA batteries and a small screwdriver to open up the battery case. Easy peasey toy, simple enough but very entertaining and brings a lot of joy to the little kid. No frustration with this one. Daughter loves it very very much! Shipping was super fast!
customer_reviews.author: coffeegirl

customer_reviews.title: remote control is great for little hands
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for our 5 year old. It is sooo cute. Had to replace the remote control batteries when we got it. Tons of fu!! Our "real" pup is a little afraid of it- well at least it won't become a chew toy! Zips fast, remote control is great for little hands, and it is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 hour
customer_reviews.text: I received this product a bit later than I expected, I assume it was because it got lost. I ordered this for a friend and she loved it. Although suddenly one of the wheels on the front stopped working and it just wouldn’t move. Then the whole toy couldn’t do anything but the eyes would lit up and there was sound and music, no movement. Therefore I was truely upset since I had thought for the price, it would have been better quality.
customer_reviews.author: darkshadow

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Gave the dog fresh batteries (batteries were not included). Dog worked for a couple minutes but would not go in a straight line. Remote stopped working after a couple minutes. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: So Cal Dad

customer_reviews.title: Agreed! Batteries die way too fast.
customer_reviews.text: With a 6 & 1 year old, I've seen my share of toys. Trust me! But the brand new Energizer batteries I put in here died in 1 day. It's a cute enough, simple little pup. Nothing fancy but kept my kids' attention. No frills. If it came with a rechargeable batteries, like most toys like this, I'd give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Robot Puppy is Too Much Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: This toy was purchased for my 3-year old grandson, but it was so much fun for us all! We got Chippo: black and yellow. He is adorable! This was enjoyed by a 3-year old, a couple of 20 somethings, and a couple of 50+ grandparents!!! Chippo was definitely the most played-with toy of our 2018 Christmas! Cute toy. Great price. So excited to have found this little gem!!!
customer_reviews.author: KarenK

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son’s 11th Birthday. First of all it arrived 1 day later than expected for unknown reasons but was still in time for his birthday. He opened this morning on his birthday before going to school, I put brand new batteries in and *poof* nothing when switched on. His heart was broken. The eyes didn’t light up and the remote never came on either. I don’t even want an exchange I just want my refund so I can get him something else that works.
customer_reviews.author: NurseHayes

customer_reviews.title: android software not kept up to date
customer_reviews.text: Was a christmas present for Grandkids. But my son says the app didn't work for the newer phones they had. By the time this was all figured out the time to return was too late. Plus they are busy and don't have time for returns. If a product is for sale it should be workable. Nobody has time for returns anymore, so they know they got you. Don't order unless you have time for returns that don't work.
customer_reviews.author: LADYXENO

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my younger son for Christmas. When my older son asked my younger son how many stars he wanted to give the robot dog, my younger son replied: "As high as it will go!" He played with it for more than five straight hours on the first day (with a short break for lunch and a few quick bathroom breaks). This really is a great toy. If you have a child who wants a dog, or a robot, or an RC toy, this is all three.
customer_reviews.author: Papa G

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is adorable!!! My 5 year old is in love with this! Works on all surfaces including carpet with ease. It's easy to control & has a several fun options which add to his charm. When you kiss or pet him he responds with sounds of licking back & even smooching. Worth every penny because he's brought nothing but smiles.❤️
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Toy works great but the battery life on this thing is horrible. You go through batteries like a fat kid loves cake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Bought brand new batteries (for dog and remote) and the dog would not turn on. It was a birthday present for my son, who has been asking for a pet. We unfortunately can not have a pet at this time, so I thought this would be a nice alternative for time time being. We were pretty disappointed when the dog did not turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: cute toy
customer_reviews.text: my 10 yr old has asked for one for a couple years. this year it was at top of the list. so we decided to get it, He loves it. for the money it is not too bad. Has cute functions, but nothing elaborate.
customer_reviews.author: C. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional toy
customer_reviews.text: Needed 4 AAA batteries in the pup but had batteries in the controller. Works just fine. The dog has lots of modes to play with, with chased the cat around with it. Good times had by all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ann C. Polk

customer_reviews.title: The first one we got did not work correctly but it was promptly replaced and now it's all good.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Grandson loves it. The first one we got did not work correctly but it was promptly replaced and now it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Lowej

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my sons 4th birthday and all the kids at the party followed this thing around for hours. Pretty durable, hasn’t broke yet which is surprising. Easy for little kids to use and big kids have fun with it too. It has a free roam setting and this little dog goes areound the whole house barking and turns itself around if it hits something. Best part is that it works great on carpet!
customer_reviews.author: cassandra ponce

customer_reviews.title: or move it's head like the description said
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present and it didn't turn or dance, or move it's head like the description said. Don't Waste your money. it was Junk.
customer_reviews.author: rita gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Remote doesn't work, right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: The remote doesn't work. My daughter can push it around by hand, and the eyes light up. But that is all. We made a target run to replace the batteries in the remote, but having replaced it, it still isn't working. I reached out to the manufacturer for resolution and am hopeful they can replace the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Robot
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this... great as a "starter" robot toy. Enough features without being confusing or too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Purchased two of these for Christmas for two boys in ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for Christmas for two boys in the same household. They have trouble with their remotes controlling each others dogs when playing at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Like it, but I wish it had more features.
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old nephew loves his little Chippie. I wish it was a bit more intuitive in terms of AI technology, but it’s simple to operate and interact with.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Blair

customer_reviews.title: Son loved it
customer_reviews.text: My son love this I got it for him for Christmas and he always playing with it and showing it off it was a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Ha Duong

customer_reviews.title: it is absolutely amazing; Almost like having a real dog around but ...
customer_reviews.text: My sister is obsessed with this gift, it is absolutely amazing; Almost like having a real dog around but without the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Hylian_Harpy

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: The Robot Toy Dog was loved by grandchildren. Great for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Danziger

customer_reviews.title: My eight year old daughter absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my eight year old daughter and she absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute little robot dog that has easy to use remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! My Son loves it..he plays with it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Kim &Tom S/K

customer_reviews.title: Just what the grandson wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old grandson birthday. My 2 year old granddaughter loved playing with it during the party. She was happy pushing buttons and seeing the dog move. So I'm buying one for her birthday in June.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute toy. Very easy for a 4 year old to use!
customer_reviews.author: Jodyanddavid

customer_reviews.title: unigue kids gift
customer_reviews.text: My childs happy usualy i purchase it for son but both kids happy
customer_reviews.author: Della Bernhardt

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun toy. My 6 year old loves his new "pet".
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Cantrelle

customer_reviews.title: My sons favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use for my 5 year old. Works great and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that big of a deal
customer_reviews.text: Thought my son would be more into it , like the last one but this one not to many features
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, and my child is happy playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: SAMMY-J

customer_reviews.title: the good is that they work good on a carpet
customer_reviews.text: Cut and paste from the review of the other Chippes dog I bought. I bought the pink dog and the black dog. For both: the good is that they work good on a carpet, are fast, and the roaming mode is great. The bad is that both are on the SAME FREQUENCY! Can't use both that I bought together because they interfere with each other.
customer_reviews.author: Colt American

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it! His kitten is not a fan. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to control
customer_reviews.text: Chippo is easy to control and the delivery came on time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This little guy super adorable my 3 kids ages 2
customer_reviews.text: I had to changr my review from 4 to 3. Pretty cool toy but not durable. Keep in mine these are meant for kids. Remote stopped working after 4 months, I changed the battery and it just wouldnt work.
customer_reviews.author: Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: It is adorable and she LOVED it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. It is adorable and she LOVED it. But, it worked for about 5 minutes before it just completely shut down and stopped working making for a sad little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Rivergal23

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift that did not work. Nothing would fix it.
customer_reviews.text: So very disappointing. Christmas gift for my granddaughter. We opened the box and Chippo does not work. We made a trip out to get new batteries cause the one in the remote is special. Not something anyone keeps in their house. After replacing all batteries in both the dog and the remote it was still DEAD!!! I would give it zero stars if that was possible for disappointing my granddaughter. We have an engineer, a tech guru and a programmer in the family. Everyone tried but there was no fixing this!! Nuf' said.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn Taylor

customer_reviews.title: ... but I threw out the box My daughter is sad We use a little screwdriver to turn it on ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has a faulty on off switch and I probably should return it but I threw out the box My daughter is sad We use a little screwdriver to turn it on and off
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Fun little play dog toy
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old got this as a gift and loves it . Batteries haven’t ran out and it’s run to have guard a spot and it responds to movement. It’s easy to control for him also.
customer_reviews.author: AP

product_meta.title: WowWee Chippies Robot Toy Dog - Chippo (Black)
product_meta.description:
Meet Chippo - your favourite watch doggie. This little black puppy with a gold doggy-bone collar prides himself on being the toughest of the Chippies pack. Chippies are a pack of playful, interactive, remote control puppies that love to show off their many tricks. Pet their heads for different reactions including sniffs, barks, puppy kisses, and even a sneeze! Use the remote control to make your pet dog dance, sing, chase its tail, or tell it which way to roll. Chippies can explore your room on their own, or guard it from intruders using their infrared sensors; they’ll even sing together as a pack! Smaller in size than the original CHiP robot dog, Chippies feature bright LED eyes, posable hind legs, along with playful sounds and animations.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




A Playful Pup of Your Own! Meet the Chippies! A pack of zippy, interactive, robotic pups. They’re loveable, playful, and sometimes a little mischievous - just like real puppies! Take your pick of the litter with different styles and personalities - there’s a puppy for everyone! 

Ready... Set... Play! These pups have as much energy as the kids playing with them! Whether they’re zipping down halls, having a dance party, or exploring their environment, these pups are ready to play at any time of day! 




CHIPPIES LOVE YOUR AFFECTION Just like real puppies, Chippies love it when you pet them! They’ll react in adorable ways including sniffs, barks, puppy kisses, and even a sneeze!

TAKE THEM FOR A WALK! Grab the included remote control, and take your puppy for a stroll! You can also make Chippies dance, sing, or chase their tails.

INTRUDER ALERT! Chippies make great watch doggies in guard mode! Red eyes warn intruders to stay away - if they come close, your pup will sound the alarm!




Adopt One Today These puppies are looking for an owner to love and play with them. Choose the puppy personality that’s right for you and bring home a doggie that’s tons of fun!




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Fun Robot Puppy

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

We thought it would be fun for CHiP to have puppies, so we brought a smaller, remote-control version into the world with some of the same tech and all of the lovability! 

What makes your product special?

Chippies are equipped with WowWee Smart Tech. We fuse the latest technology with larger-than-life personality traits to turn this pack of puppies into true companions.

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

Watching kids laugh hysterically as they discover all of the different ways to play with our toy
feature_bullets: Chippo the toughest of the pack - this black puppy with a gold doggy-bone collar wants to be your favorite watchdog.
Pet Chippo's head for different reactions including sniffs, barks, puppy kisses, and even a sneeze!
Use the matching remote control to make Chippo dance, sing, chase its tail, or tell it which way to roll.
Chippies can explore your room, or guard it from intruders using their sensors.
Chippies will sing together as a pack and can also interact with CHiP
